School.Name: Azusa Pacific University

School.Name: Indiana University
School.Description: Indiana University is a public research university located in Bloomington, Indiana, United States. With over 48,000 students, IU Bloomington is the flagship institution of the Indiana University system and its largest university. IU ranks in top 100 national universities in the United States and the top 50 public universities in the country. There are more than 650 student organizations on campus, and over 350 majors. The campus is right in the heart of beautiful Bloomington IN and includes abundant green space and historic buildings dating to the university’s reconstruction in the late nineteenth century. While not having a mascot all of the 24 sports are known as “Hoosiers” and compete in the Big Ten conference.

BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Indiana University is a public research university located in Bloomington, Indiana, United States. With over 48,000 students, IU Bloomington is the flagship institution of the Indiana University system and its largest university.  IU ranks in top 100 national universities in the United States and the top 50 public universities in the country. There are more than 650 student organizations on campus, and over 350 majors.  The campus is right in the heart of beautiful Bloomington IN and includes abundant green space and historic buildings dating to the university’s reconstruction in the late nineteenth century.  While not having a mascot all of the 24 sports are known as “Hoosiers” and compete in the Big Ten conference.

Needs.Requirements: Touching at our around 10 feet. Must be a very good student.

School.Name: Indiana University of Pennsylvania
School.Description: IUP is located 57 east of Pittsburgh, PA. IUP is a member of the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference. Long-known as the NCAA’s largest one-state conference, the PSAC now consists of 18 institutions located within the Commonwealth. The IUP Volleyball program, in 2014—15, had the number one GPA in the PSAC, of any sport, a statement to our academic emphasis and success. With 130 undergraduate majors, we offer the athlete the opportunity to pursue their career path. Undergraduate populations is just over 13,000, making us a perfect medium sized school. Not too small and not too big. The volleyball team competes in the Kovalchick Convention and Athletic Center, a 5,000 seat arena, which is state of the art. A pro-style team locker room, complete with meeting area and two big screen TV’s, is the perfect place for your gear and preparations. Our University and our Volleyball program at IUP take pride in our’ family style’ approach to the student life experience.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Indiana University of Pennsylvania (IUP)
LOCATION (City, State):  Indiana, PA
DIVISION: II
CONTACT NAME: Scott Pennewill, Head Women’s Coach
CONTACT PHONE#: 724-357-3198
CONTACT E-MAIL: spenn@iup.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE: http://www.iupathletics.com/index.aspx?path=wvball
2019 NEEDS: OH, Pin hitters.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: We would like the OH to be a six rotation player with excellent passing skills.  Proficient in her ability to terminate out of serve receive.  Unshakeable confidence and wants the ball at crunch time.  All pin hitters should be strong and confident and able to overcome setbacks quickly and compete on every ball.  Coachable and a team player first and foremost.  All players should be of a growth mindset with a strong work ethic.
SCHOLARSHIP? Partial scholarships that are augmented with need and merit based financial aid.
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: IUP is located 57 east of Pittsburgh, PA.  IUP is a member of the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference.  Long-known as the NCAA’s largest one-state conference, the PSAC now consists of 18 institutions located within the Commonwealth. The IUP Volleyball program, in 2014—15, had the number one GPA in the PSAC, of any sport, a statement to our academic emphasis and success.  With 130 undergraduate majors, we offer the athlete the opportunity to pursue their career path. Undergraduate populations is just over 13,000, making us a perfect medium sized school.  Not too small and not too big.   The volleyball team competes in the Kovalchick Convention and Athletic Center, a 5,000 seat arena, which is  state of the art.  A pro-style team locker room, complete with meeting area and two big screen TV’s, is the perfect place for your gear and preparations.  Our University and our Volleyball program at IUP take pride in our’ family style’ approach to the student life experience.

Needs.Requirements: We would like the OH to be a six rotation player with excellent passing skills. Proficient in her ability to terminate out of serve receive. Unshakeable confidence and wants the ball at crunch time. All pin hitters should be strong and confident and able to overcome setbacks quickly and compete on every ball. Coachable and a team player first and foremost. All players should be of a growth mindset with a strong work ethic.

School.Name: Oakland University
School.Description: public university located in the cities of Auburn Hills and Rochester MI Situated on a 1,443-acre (5.84 km2) campus, it was co-founded by Matilda Dodge Wilson and John A. Hannah. It is the only major research university in Oakland County, from which the school derives its name, and it serves much of the Metro Detroit region. The Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement of Teaching has classified OU as a Doctoral Research University
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Oakland University
LOCATION (City, State): Rochester, MI
DIVISION: I

CONTACT PHONE#: 248-370-3643
CONTACT E-MAIL: paszkiewicz@oakland.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE: http://www.goldengrizzlies.com/sports/w-volley/oakl-w-volley-body.html
2018 NEEDS: OH, MH, DS/L
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Approach touch of 10-0 for middle hitters. Approach touch of 9’8’ for outside hitters.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes, for OH and MH with cost of attendance possible. A DS/L must be willing to walk-on.
2019 NEEDS: S, RS, DS/L
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Approach touch of 10-0 for RS. Approach touch of 9’6” for S.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes, for S and RS with cost of attendance possible. A DS/L must be willing to walk-on
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Oakland University is a medium sized, doctoral research university of approximately 21,000 students. The campus is located in Rochester, MI, a beautiful Detroit suburb that was recently ranked by Money magazine as the 9th best place to live in America. With more than 130 majors and 270 total degree and/or certificate programs, including nationally and regionally ranked programs in health science, elementary education, business, and engineering, we have outstanding academic offering across a breadth of fields. The Golden Grizzlies are a successful volleyball program on the court having won the Horizon League Regular Season or Tournament title in 2014 and having finished 3rd or higher in their league in each of the last 5 seasons. Academically, during head coach, Rob Beam’s, tenure we have earned the AVCA Team Academic Award six times and currently hold a cumulative team GPA of 3.4. Finally, our commitment is to providing a first-class, student-athlete centered experience grounded in a family atmosphere and focussed on aiding the growth of each of the women in our program.

Needs.Requirements: Outside Hitter with passing efficiency, and ability to terminate (touching min. 9’7″).
Approach touch of 10-0 for middle hitters. Approach touch of 9’8’ for outside hitters.
Approach touch of 10-0 for RS. Approach touch of 9’6” for S.

School.Name: Ohio Wesleyan University
School.CityState: Delaware, Ohio (just north of Columbus, Ohio)
School.Description: OWU (OH-WOOO) is a Nationally ranked Liberal Arts and Science University – part of the40 Colleges That Change Lives publication. A beautiful, friendly campus built in 1842 with a wonderful mix of old and new. We have amazing travel learning experiences, small classroom sizes, with actual professors that teach the courses. Our campus sits in the middle of downtown Delaware, a friendly and fun town full of boutiques, breweries and restaurants – and while we are a small student body (1800-2000 students), we are very diverse with students from all over the country, and our residential campus is full of wonderful social interaction. Athletics is a major part of our campus where you will be supported in the classroom, on the court, and in your life. We encourage life balance, which means you will have the opportunity to be trained at a high level, as well as encouraged and supported to have experiences outside of your sport. Become a Battling Bishop!

School.Name: University of Montana
School.Description: The University of Montana is located in Missoula, MT. It is a college town of approximately 70,000 people located between two of the country’s most beautiful natural attractions, Yellowstone and Glacier National Parks. The university itself has a student population of 15,000 and offers programs for a wide range of academic interests, including physical therapy, journalism, education, law, business, exercise science, athletic training, psychology, fine arts and a list of many more. Our volleyball team is an NCAA Division I program that competes in the Big Sky Conference with teams such as Portland State, Sacramento State, Northern Colorado, Northern Arizona and others.

School.Name: University of Portland
School.Description: University of Portland is coming-off a 3rd place finish in the West Coast Conference in 2016, while notching wins over several Top 25 ranked opponents. While we are a competitive volleyball program, we place a large emphasis on academics, with top majors for our student-athletes including biology, engineering, nursing, education and business. Our beautiful campus is located just 10 minutes from downtown Portland, 1.5 hours from the Oregon Coast, and 1 hour from Mt. Hood.

OH that plays 6 rotations anc can pass extremely well. Setter needs to have the ability to play 6 rotations and must have a strong serve. Beach experience is a plus for all positions.

School.Name: Ball State University
School.Description: Ball State is located in Muncie, IN and offers over 190 majors. Our enrollment is around 21,000 students and we play in the Mid-American Conference.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Ball State University
LOCATION (City, State): Muncie, IN
DIVISION: D1
CONTACT NAME: Kelli Miller
CONTACT PHONE#: 765-285-1123
CONTACT E-MAIL: kmiller2@bsu.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE ADDRESS: www.ballstatesports.com/womensvolleyball
2017 NEEDS: OH, MH
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:
SCHOLARSHIP? No full ride athletic scholarships available. Open to athletes who would consider 1, 2 or 3 year offers.
2018 NEEDS: OH, MH, RS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: OH- We are looking for a 6 rotation attacker that’s comfortable passing to attack. We are looking for someone with quick foot speed and a fast arm. We like to play a fast tempo offense, so we need an attacker who’s quick, can hit shots and simply gets after it on the court. The ball control piece is big for this position as we like our offensive players to be able to move around after they pass to run various routes. We also like the OH to be able to attack from the back row as well, so having someone who’s comfortable with their ball control is important. MH- We are looking for a MH that likes to run off one foot to attack. She needs to have quick feet and a fast arm as well. We love to set slides and other various one foot attacking sets, so having someone that can chase and get on the ball quick is important. We would like her to be approach touching at 10’ or above so that she can be successful at blocking as well. Competitive drive is also important in this position. Our middles work hard so we can get them the ball so they lots of effort and grit. RS- We are looking for a 2 foot attacker that can terminate at the pin. She can hit 2nd tempo balls as well as traditional behind the setter sets. She needs to be a blocking presence. Foot speed is good, but fast arm and hitting a heavy ball is more important.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes, available for all positions
2019 NEEDS: OH and open to other positions depending on how previous recruiting classes develop
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Could be O1 or O2, but definitely someone with foot speed and a good arm. Libero- ball control and a play maker
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Ball State is located in Muncie, IN and offers over 190 majors. Our enrollment is around 21,000 students and we play in the Mid-American Conference.

Needs.Requirements: OH- We are looking for a 6 rotation attacker that’s comfortable passing to attack. We are looking for someone with quick foot speed and a fast arm. We like to play a fast tempo offense, so we need an attacker who’s quick, can hit shots and simply gets after it on the court. The ball control piece is big for this position as we like our offensive players to be able to move around after they pass to run various routes. We also like the OH to be able to attack from the back row as well, so having someone who’s comfortable with their ball control is important. MH- We are looking for a MH that likes to run off one foot to attack. She needs to have quick feet and a fast arm as well. We love to set slides and other various one foot attacking sets, so having someone that can chase and get on the ball quick is important. We would like her to be approach touching at 10’ or above so that she can be successful at blocking as well. Competitive drive is also important in this position. Our middles work hard so we can get them the ball so they lots of effort and grit. RS- We are looking for a 2 foot attacker that can terminate at the pin. She can hit 2nd tempo balls as well as traditional behind the setter sets. She needs to be a blocking presence. Foot speed is good, but fast arm and hitting a heavy ball is more important.
Could be O1 or O2, but definitely someone with foot speed and a good arm. Libero- ball control and a play maker
Needs.Notes: OPEN TO OTHER POSITIONS DEPENDING ON HOW PREVIOUS RECRUITING CLASSES DEVELOP|

School.Name: Belhaven University
School.Description: Belhaven is a Christian University in Jackson, Mississippi. Jackson is the capital of Mississippi and has 500,000 people in the metro area. Belhaven has a beautiful campus and has an enrollment of about 1300-1400 traditional students. While being a Christian is not a requirement, every class is taught from a Christian world view and we have chapel every week. Our team is a family and we act as such.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Belhaven University
LOCATION (City, State): Jackson, MS
DIVISION: III
CONTACT NAME: Justin Dee
CONTACT PHONE#: 601-968-8891
CONTACT E-MAIL: jdee@belhaven.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE: http://blazers.belhaven.edu/index.aspx?path=wvball&
2017 NEEDS: Middle, Right, Setter
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: High Volleyball IQ.  Great shot selection, ball control, and quick feet. Setters need to be able to set all the way across the net. We will be focusing on blocking for our middle and right positions.
SCHOLARSHIP? NCAA Division III does not allow for athletic scholarships, but academic scholarships and other need based aid is available. Minimum of 3.0 GPA and 20 on ACT (1000 two part SAT).
2018 NEEDS: Middle, Setter, Outside
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: High Volleyball IQ.  Middle will need to have a heavy arm.  Touch 9’6+. Setters will need to be a vocal leader on the court and also need to be able to set all sets across the net.  We will be focusing on attacking for our middle.  Outside will need to have offensive ball control and be able to play 6 rotations.
SCHOLARSHIP?  NCAA Division III does not allow for athletic scholarships, but academic scholarships and other need based aid is available.  Minimum of 3.0 GPA and 20 on ACT (1000 two part SAT).
2019 NEEDS: Outside, Libero
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outside will need to have a high volleyball IQ.  Be a leader.  Looking for attacking outside and not necessarily a 6 rotation player.  Middles who want to move to outside in college and encouraged.  Libero will need to be very vocal and add energy to the court.  She will need to be proficient in setting the second ball and playing from the 5 position.
SCHOLARSHIP? NCAA Division III does not allow for athletic scholarships, but academic scholarships and other need based aid is available.  Minimum of 3.0 GPA and 20 on ACT (1000 two part SAT).
2020 NEEDS: We will begin recruiting 2020 in January 2018.
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Belhaven is a Christian University in Jackson, Mississippi. Jackson is the capital of Mississippi and has 500,000 people in the metro area. Belhaven has a beautiful campus and has an enrollment of about 1300-1400 traditional students. While being a Christian is not a requirement, every class is taught from a Christian world view and we have chapel every week.  Our team is a family and we act as such.

Needs.Requirements: High Volleyball IQ. Great shot selection, ball control, and quick feet. Setters need to be able to set all the way across the net. We will be focusing on blocking for our middle and right positions.

High Volleyball IQ. Middle will need to have a heavy arm. Touch 9’6+. Setters will need to be a vocal leader on the court and also need to be able to set all sets across the net. We will be focusing on attacking for our middle. Outside will need to have offensive ball control and be able to play 6 rotations.

Outside will need to have a high volleyball IQ. Be a leader. Looking for attacking outside and not necessarily a 6 rotation player. Middles who want to move to outside in college and encouraged. Libero will need to be very vocal and add energy to the court. She will need to be proficient in setting the second ball and playing from the 5 position.

Needs.Notes: WE WILL BEGIN RECRUITING 2020 IN JANUARY 2018.|

School.Name: Brown University
School.Description: Brown has a very motivated and diverse student body with 6,200 undergraduates, 2,000 graduate students and 490 medical school students. There are over 700 faculty members at Brown University. Students come from all 50 states and more than 115 countries. Undergraduates pursue bachelor’s degrees in more than 70 concentrations, ranging from Egyptology to cognitive neuroscience. Students must take responsibility in architecting their courses of study because there are no required general education courses. This makes for some of the happiest students in the country. With its very talented and motivated student body and well-accomplished Faculty, Brown is a leading research university that maintains a high commitment to exceptional undergraduate instruction.

Cedarville Volleyball is the only champion that the G-MAC has known in the sport of volleyball.

School.Name: Central Michigan University
School.Description: Central Michigan University is conveniently located in the center of Michigan’s Lower Peninsula within the friendly community of Mount Pleasant, Michigan – a charming and historic town of around 25,000 located among the pristine lakes, forests, beaches and ski resorts of Northern Michigan and the museums, shopping centers, arts festivals, and other attractions of metropolitan areas to the south and east. When considering colleges, CMU is a top academic institution. We are a multifaceted national university offering more than 170 programs at the Bachelor’s, Master’s, Specialist’s, and Doctoral levels. The Carnegie Foundation recognizes CMU as a Doctoral/Research-Intensive University that offers a wide range of baccalaureate and graduate programs. Central Michigan University has a tradition of outstanding athletic programs. We offer academic support with tutors, computer labs, study halls, and mentorship. CMU is 1 of 29 Division I schools nationally to be awarded the Program of Excellence Award. We have also won the MAC Academic Achievement Award 10 out of the last 11 years, and 6 years in a row.

When considering colleges, CMU is a top academic institution. We are a multifaceted national university offering more than 170 programs at the Bachelor’s, Master’s, Specialist’s, and Doctoral levels. 2017 NEEDS: OH x2; MB x1; Libero/DSx2
SCHOLARSHIP? 5 full
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Chicago State is a favorable academic institution.  Specializes in CMAT, Nursing, Health Science, Business and Education. 36 Bachelors Degrees; 27 Masters Degrees; 2 Doctoral degrees and 6 Graduate Certificates. Small and sits on 80 acres of land. One of the safest residential campuses in Illinois.

Needs.Requirements: 6’0 or higher for MB; can run slides, 31s; 3; As; 1s; solid block at net; elbows; not afraid to play one rotation in BR after you serve; Setter

School.Name: Clemson University
School.Description: Clemson University is located in Clemson, SC. Clemson is a member of the Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC). Ranked as the 21st best national public university byU.S.News & World Report, , Clemson University leads the way in providing a hands-on education — in the lab, in the arts and in the field. Academic programs lay the groundwork for innovative research at this South Carolina university. With more than 80 undergraduate majors and 110 graduate degree programs, there are plenty of opportunities and career paths to choose from. Our beautiful college campus sits on 1,400 acres in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, along the shores of Hartwell Lake. This is the place you will remember forever and long to return to years after you leave.

School.Name: Colby Community College
School.Description: Colby Community College is located in the northwest corner of Kansas, approximately 50 miles from the Colorado and Nebraska borders. The area is part of the High Plains, sweeping upward to the Rocky Mountains 250 miles to the west. CCC is a member of the prestigious, nationally-known Jayhawk Conference, of which the Lady Trojans have claimed a volleyball conference title and a second place finish in the last two years. The volleyball team is coached by Head Coach Carey Jones, who will enter her seventh season in the fall of 2015.

BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION:  Elon is a highly academic Division I liberal arts university located between Greensboro and Raleigh, NC. We are an institution which has reinvented itself in the last 15 years to emerge as one of the top schools in the nation. If you are interested in experiencing DI volleyball, high level academics, study abroad, internships, research and leadership opportunities at a mid-sized school with a 12:1 student-faculty ratio on a perennially top-ranked most beautiful campus in the nation, please explore what Elon has to offer you, https://www.elon.edu/e/about/rankings-and-recognition.html. 2017 CAMP DATES:  will be updated by February

Needs.Requirements: Possible Setter/Hitter – (4-yr walk-on) capable of competing for a hitting position, but also capable of running a 6-2, consistent set location, interested in pushing for court time in either position. Possible Setter/DS – (walk-on) defensive-minded setter, could run a 6-2, consistent set location, capable of being a possible setter but would embrace and compete for DS role as well.

OH/RS – (4-yr) 6’0+, terminating capability, good hand control, 6-rot is a bonus. MB – (4-yr) 6’1+, quick laterally/vertically, touching 9’10+, block can be more developed than swing. Possible DS/Libero – (4-yr walk-on) playing at a high club level, quick feet, solid platform, tough serve, vocal.

OH/RS – (4-yr) 6’0+, terminating capability, good hand control, 6-rot is a bonus. MB – (4-yr) 6’1+, quick laterally/vertically, touching 9’10+, block can be more developed than swing. Possible Setter – (4-yr) 5’10+, quick feet, consistent set location, hard worker defensively. Possible DS/Libero – (2-yr) playing at a high club level, quick feet, solid platform, tough serve, vocal.

OH/RS – (4-yr) 6’0+, terminating capability, good hand control, 6-rot is a bonus. MB – (4-yr) 6’1+, quick laterally/vertically, touching 9’10+, block can be more developed than swing. Possible Setter – (4-yr) 5’10+, quick feet, consistent set location, hard worker defensively. Possible DS/Libero – (3-yr) playing at a high club level, quick feet, solid platform, tough serve, vocal.

School.Name: Georgia Institute of Technology
School.Description: Georgia Tech is one of the top public universities in the United States playing in one of the top volleyball conferences in the NCAA. It is a unique blend of top tier academics and high level volleyball. Georgia Tech is ranked #7 among public universities in the country by U.S. News & World Report, and the Georgia Tech College of Engineering is consistently ranked in the nation’s top five by the magazine. In 2014, Tech was ranked #1 smartest public college by Business Insider magazine. Georgia Tech has the best of both worlds — a traditional and beautiful 400-acre campus located in a major city. Within the thriving, creative metropolis of Atlanta, Georgia, Tech’s Midtown neighborhood is home to young professionals, families, students, and the city’s main central source of green space, Piedmont Park. The campus is next door to businesses, museums, theaters, restaurants, and retail stores. In addition to its inexhaustible source of cultural and entertainment options, Atlanta is a great city for a college. Tech’s Atlanta location will play an integral part in your education, by putting you in close proximity to real-world projects, valuable co-op jobs, and meaningful internships.

School.Name: Kean University
School.Description: Kean University is a first-class Division III athletic department, located on a safe and modern campus, 20 minutes west of New York City. With over 160 years of teacher education, Kean has been rated the #1 most valuable teaching degree in the United States by Payscale.com. Among our diverse academic programs, we also offer attractive programs in Design, Criminal Justice, Global Business, and the various health sciences as well as the STEM fields. For more please visit www.Kean.edu

School.Name: Life Pacific College
School.Description: Life Pacific College is a small Christian School with a big family feel. The students are a close group that support each other at all times. School has 500 students and looking to grow with the purchases of land nearby. The volleyball program is very competitive and plays teams like University of La Verne and Cal Lutheran, top 10 D 3 teams as well as top NAIA teams. Coach Sean Douglas has been a club coach in the area for over a decade and has sent hundreds of girls to college on volleyball scholarships. As a high school coach, he has been named coach of the year numerous times and his teams have won 2 CIF Championships.

School.Name: Lourdes University
School.Description: Lourdes University is a Franciscan Catholic institution with a student enrollment of approximately 2,500 students and a student to faculty ratio of 12 to 1. Lourdes has a wide variety of majors, minors, pre-professional programs, and graduate programs. A few examples of degrees offered are business, criminal justice, and pre-med. Lourdes also has apartment style living, featuring one and two bedrooms with full kitchens, baths, and living rooms. If you are looking for a great private school environment Lourdes is ready and waiting to welcome you!

School.Name: Marietta College
School.Description: Marietta College is an academically selective, liberal arts college located in Marietta, OH, in the Southeast portion of the state. Marietta College is a member of the Ohio Valley Conference (OVC) and Division III of the NCAA. Marietta is a nationally competitive program. We’ve made it to post-season play each of the past four years with the ultimate goal of making the NCAA tournament.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Marietta College
LOCATION (City, State): Marietta, OH
DIVISION: III
CONTACT NAME: Bob Howard
CONTACT PHONE#: 740-376-4902
CONTACT E-MAIL: Reh002@marietta.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE ADDRESS: http://pioneers.marietta.edu
2016 NEEDS: Looking for a large class in 2016 with 4 positions opening up in 2016 and another 2-3 possibly opening in 2017. We expect the 2016 class to define our program for several years. Looking for a starting level setter, looking for a power hitting outside or right-side hitter, looking for a ball-control OH (L2) and a middle blocker.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Setter – run a strong middle-oriented offense, accurate and consistent in her delivery while jump-setting most every ball. Blocking height is a factor since we run a 5-1. Power hitter (OH or RS) – 5-10 or bigger, powerful enough to beat the block at the net, disadvantage the defense out of the back row and put up a strong block. MB (5-11 or bigger) – an imposing blocker, long and agile enough to impose all along the net. A strong hitter, able to run a variety of quick attacks in both serve receive and transition. L2 (5-8 or bigger) – looking for a dynamic player who can hold their own at the net while providing libero-type passing and defense. DS – provides precise ball control passing and digging, aggressive and quick enough to cover more than their share of the court. At all positions we value length, athleticism, intelligence and aggressiveness, players who are good students and great teammates.
SCHOLARSHIP? Marietta is an NCAA D-III college and, thus, does not offer athletic scholarships. We do, however, offer academic scholarships, merit grants and a full array of need-based aid.
2017 NEEDS: Looking for upgrades at any position, players who can compete at the National level in D-III. Setter, power outside or right-side hitter, middle blocker, ball control OH or DS.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Setter – starting potential at 2 positions (e.g., setter/DS, or setter/RS). Accurate and consistent jump-setter, able to run a quick tempo, middle-oriented offense. Power hitter (OH or RS) – 5-10 or bigger, powerful enough to beat the block at the net, disadvantage the defense hitting out of the back row and put up a strong block. MB (5-11 or bigger) – an imposing blocker, long and agile enough to impose all along the net. A strong hitter, able to run a variety of quick attacks in both serve receive and transition. L2 and/or DS – 5-8 or bigger, someone who passes and digs precisely while covering a large portion of the court and, at L2, can still hold their own at the net. At all positions we value length, athleticism, intelligence and aggressiveness, players who are good students and great teammates.
SCHOLARSHIP? Marietta is an NCAA D-III college and, thus, does not offer athletic scholarships. We do, however, offer academic scholarships, merit grants and a full array of need-based aid.
2018 NEEDS: We typically don’t recruit freshmen unless they are specifically interested in us.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: At all positions we value length, athleticism, intelligence and aggressiveness, players who are good students and great teammates.
SCHOLARSHIP? Marietta is an NCAA D-III college and, thus, does not offer athletic scholarships. We do, however, offer academic scholarships, merit grants and a full array of need-based aid.
2019 NEEDS: We typically don’t recruit pre-freshmen unless they are specifically interested in us.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: At all positions we value length, athleticism, intelligence and aggressiveness, players who are good students and great teammates.
SCHOLARSHIP? Marietta is an NCAA D-III college and, thus, does not offer athletic scholarships. We do, however, offer academic scholarships, merit grants and a full array of need-based aid.

School.Name: MCLA (Massachusetts College of Liberal Arts)
School.Description: As Massachusetts’ designated public liberal arts college, MCLA is committed to helping students develop the critical thinking and communication skills that employers seek in today’s complex global economy. MCLA ranks high nationally for small classes, innovative teaching, personal interactions with faculty, opportunities for faculty-supervised research, and a supportive atmosphere. Nestled in the beautiful Berkshires minutes from museums, galleries, hiking and skiing.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: MCLA (Massachusetts College of Liberal Arts)
LOCATION (City, State): North Adams, Massachusetts
DIVISION: NCAA Div. III
CONTACT NAME: Amanda Beckwith
CONTACT PHONE#: 413-662.5061
CONTACT E-MAIL: wvolleyball@mcla.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE ADDRESS: http://athletics.mcla.edu/sports/wvball/index
2016 NEEDS:  2 O, MH
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outsides should have high volleyball IQ and be successful in all six rotations. Middle should be able to hit 1’s, 31’s, and slides. Successful applicants will have a 3.0 GPA or higher.
SCHOLARSHIP? Competitive Financial Aid packages and merit scholarship, but not athletic scholarships as we are a Div. III school.
2017 NEEDS: O, M, RS, L
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:  Outsides should have high volleyball IQ and be successful in all six rotations. Middle should be able to hit 1’s, 31’s, and slides. Right side must have strong block and ability to be back up setter. Successful applicants will have a 3.0 GPA or higher
SCHOLARSHIP? Competitive Financial Aid packages and merit scholarship, but not athletic scholarships as we are a Div. III school.
2018 NEEDS: S, 2 M, O, L, RS who also can set
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Setter who can also hit, but able to run 5-1 if needed. Middles able to able to hit 1’s, 31’s, and slides. Outside should have high volleyball IQ and be successful in all six rotations. Libero has to be vocal and be playing at the highest levels in club volleyball. Successful applicants will have a 3.5 GPA or higher
SCHOLARSHIP? Competitive Financial Aid packages and merit scholarship, but not athletic scholarships as we are a Div. III school.
2019 NEEDS: S, M, O, 2 DS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:  Defensive specialists have to be vocal and be playing at the high club level volleyball. Setter who can also hit, but able to run 5-1 if needed. Middles able to able to hit 1’s, 31’s, and slides. Outside should have high volleyball IQ and be successful in all six rotations. Successful applicants will have a 3.0 GPA or higher
SCHOLARSHIP? Competitive Financial Aid packages and merit scholarship, but not athletic scholarships as we are a Div. III school.
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION:  As Massachusetts’ designated public liberal arts college, MCLA is committed to helping students develop the critical thinking and communication skills that employers seek in today’s complex global economy. MCLA ranks high nationally for small classes, innovative teaching, personal interactions with faculty, opportunities for faculty-supervised research, and a supportive atmosphere. Nestled in the beautiful Berkshires minutes from museums, galleries, hiking and skiing.

School.Name: Mississippi State University
School.Description: Mississippi State is located in Starkville, MS. The school is part of the South Eastern Conference (SEC). Sports on campus is a driving attraction to the school because of the competitiveness and high success. The campus has 20,000 students and over 120 majors. The academic areas with high recognition is Engineering, Business, Veterinary, Biology Sciences, and Agriculture The coaching staff is new to Mississippi State and had the program’s 2nd best season in 45 years in their 1st fall season.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Mississippi State University
LOCATION (City, State): Starkville, MS
DIVISION: I CONTACT NAME: John Newberry
CONTACT PHONE#: 972-415-4285
CONTACT E-MAIL: jnewberry@athletics.msstate.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE: HAILSTATE.COM
2017 NEEDS: OH
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: OH needs to be able to have great ball control. Looking for someone with high spike velocity.
SCHOLARSHIP? YES for OH. Scholarship is a possibility in the future for other front row positions.
2018 NEEDS: OH, RS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: OH – Needs to be able to be quick on their feet and who understands a fast offense. Ball control is not a major priority. Being able to hit out of the back row is necessary as well. RS – We are looking for a 2 or 1 footed attacker who can get up and bang with confidence. We need someone who has good blocking awareness and can get elbows over and past the net.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes, available for all positions. Also looking for high academics for a walk on as well.
2019 NEEDS: MH, RS, S, DS/L
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: MH – We are looking for a MH who can hit at any location and is versatile on 2 or 1 footed take offs. We like for our middles to be able to hit in S/R from any position along the net. We look for a fast, high, quick arm swing. RS – We are looking for a 2 or 1 footed attacker who can get up and bang with confidence. We need someone who has good blocking awareness and can get elbows over and past the net. Our biggest emphasis is someone who can terminate the ball with a ton of power. DS/L – We are looking for someone with incredible confidence and who can take charge on the back row. Scholarship money is possible for a couple years. Not guaranteed.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Mississippi State is located in Starkville, MS. The school is part of the South Eastern Conference (SEC). Sports on campus is a driving attraction to the school because of the competitiveness and high success. The campus has 20,000 students and over 120 majors. The academic areas with high recognition is Engineering, Business, Veterinary, Biology Sciences, and Agriculture The coaching staff is new to Mississippi State and had the program’s 2nd best season in 45 years in their 1st fall season.

Needs.Requirements: OH needs to be able to have great ball control. Looking for someone with high spike velocity.

OH – Needs to be able to be quick on their feet and who understands a fast offense. Ball control is not a major priority. Being able to hit out of the back row is necessary as well. RS – We are looking for a 2 or 1 footed attacker who can get up and bang with confidence. We need someone who has good blocking awareness and can get elbows over and past the net.

MH – We are looking for a MH who can hit at any location and is versatile on 2 or 1 footed take offs. We like for our middles to be able to hit in S/R from any position along the net. We look for a fast, high, quick arm swing. RS – We are looking for a 2 or 1 footed attacker who can get up and bang with confidence. We need someone who has good blocking awareness and can get elbows over and past the net. Our biggest emphasis is someone who can terminate the ball with a ton of power. DS/L – We are looking for someone with incredible confidence and who can take charge on the back row. Scholarship money is possible for a couple years. Not guaranteed.

School.Description: Highlands University is a state-supported institution established in 1893 and offers bachelor’s and master’s degrees in a variety of disciplines. Highlands is known for its multiethnic student body, small classes, research activities, student and faculty achievements, affordability and opportunities for students to combine study with real-world experience. Athletically, Highlands University competes in the Rocky Mountain Athletic Conference (RMAC).

2016 NEEDS: Middle Blocker, S, OH

On the OH, we are looking for 6 rotation player with solid ball control and defensive skills and hits a good high ball. In the MH, we are looking for an athletic player with a strong presence at the net (blocking and attacking).
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes, we offer both academic and athletic scholarships. We are able to give full rides to out of state student athletes.

In the MH, we are looking for an athletic player with a strong presence at the net (blocking and attacking). In a libero we need a strong left side defender, that works hard to keep balls in system in serve receive.

School.Name: Nicholls State University
School.Description: Nicholls State University is a gem of school in Thibodaux, LA nestled on the bayou between New Orleans and Baton Rouge. South central Louisiana is like no place else on earth. Nothing here is done in half measures. People enjoy life to the fullest – the food, the sunshine, the quick hugs and easy laughter – which explains why we draw visitors from all over the world. Nicholls State University is very much an expression of this generous and embracing culture. We believe in a serious education delivered with gusto. That means intense learning, career preparations, fast friendships and an appetite for accomplishment. Total enrollment is approximately 7000 which makes for an ideal size and a balance of small class sizes and personal attention.

South central Louisiana is like no place else on earth. Nothing here is done in half measures. People enjoy life to the fullest – the food, the sunshine, the quick hugs and easy laughter – which explains why we draw visitors from all over the world. Nicholls State University is very much an expression of this generous and embracing culture. We believe in a serious education delivered with gusto. That means intense learning, career preparations, fast friendships and an appetite for accomplishment. Total enrollment is approximately 7000 which makes for an ideal size and a balance of small class sizes and personal attention.

School.Name: Oglethorpe University
School.Description: Founded in 1835, Atlanta’s Oglethorpe University enrolls over 1,000 students representing 34 states and 28 countries. We are a member of the Annapolis Group, an organization of America’s most selective liberal arts institutions. OU is consistently listed among the best colleges in the Princeton Review and Forbes and has been named to the President’s Higher Education Community Service Honor Roll since 2006. Oglethorpe is located on a beautiful, self-contained Gothic campus near Atlanta’s Buckhead neighborhood. We offer small, personal classes in academically rigorous programs (including an individually planned major, which presents nearly endless options); partnerships with 20 Atlanta colleges and universities, including Emory, Georgia Tech and SCAD; and signature programs such as Urban Ecology, Rich Urban Leadership Program, the Honors Program, and the Oglethorpe University Museum of Art

School.Name: Ohio University
School.Description: Medium sized school of just over 20,000 students located in a true college town. 250 majors, with several being ranked very high nationally. Successful D1 volleyball program both on and off the court that has won either MAC conference regular season, tournament championship, or both in 11 of the last 12 years. During that time, the average RPI for our program has been 35. Ranked top 25 in attendance each of the last 8 years. Earned AVCA Team Academic Award the last six years.

School.Name: Plattsburgh State College
School.Description: Just to give you a little information about our university, we are located in upstate New York right next to the beautiful Lake Champlain. We are a short fifteen- minute ferry ride from Burlington, Vermont and forty- five minutes away from the powdery slopes at Lake Placid. The city of Montreal is also only a mere sixty minutes from our campus. Our University offers a variety of majors and a very active campus life. We are also on the doorstep to the largest national park in the United States, The Adirondacks.

School.Name: Princeton University
School.Description: Princeton University is a vibrant community of scholarship and learning that stands in the nation’s service and the service of humanity. Chartered in 1746, Princeton is the fourth-oldest college in the United States. Princeton is an independent, coeducational, nondenominational institution that provides undergraduate and graduate instruction in the humanities, social sciences, natural sciences and engineering. As a world-renowned research university, Princeton seeks to achieve the highest levels of distinction in the discovery and transmission of knowledge and understanding. At the same time, Princeton is distinctive among research universities in its commitment to undergraduate teaching. Today, more than 1,100 faculty members instruct approximately 5,200 undergraduate students and 2,600 graduate students. The University’s generous financial aid program ensures that talented students from all economic backgrounds can afford a Princeton education.

At the same time, Princeton is distinctive among research universities in its commitment to undergraduate teaching. Today, more than 1,100 faculty members instruct approximately 5,200 undergraduate students and 2,600 graduate students. School.Name: Quinnipiac University
School.Description: Quinnipiac is located in Hamden, CT. The University competes in the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference (MAAC). A private, coeducational university, Quinnipiac offers 20 graduate and 58 undergraduate programs in a technology-rich environment. Ranked among best universities offering undergraduate and master’s degree programs in U.S. News & World Report’s “America’s Best Colleges” and The Princeton Review’s “The Best 373 Colleges;” School of Business included in Bloomberg BusinessWeek’s “Top 100 Undergraduate Business Schools;” graduate physician assistant program ranked 5th nationally by U.S. News & World Report; graduate pathologists’ assistant program is the oldest and largest in the country.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: Quinnipiac University
LOCATION (City, State): Hamden, CT
DIVISION: NCAA Division I
CONTACT NAME: Chad Davis
CONTACT PHONE#: 203-582-7784
CONTACT E-MAIL: Chad.Davis@Quinnipiac.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE ADDRESS: http://www.quinnipiacbobcats.com/index.aspx?path=wvball
2017 NEEDS: Libero, Middle
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: MH: Need to be proficient at 1s, 3s and slides. Great lateral speed putting up a dominant block up.  We like our middles to have the capability to hit from all positions in serve-receive. Libero: Great in serve-receive and defense with an ability to read attackers. Want a vocal leader who captains the defense and back-row at all times.
SCHOLARSHIP? YES.
2018 NEEDS: OH, MH, Libero/DS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: OH: Needs to be a six-rotation player who can pass and hit from multiple positions on the floor including the back row. MH: Need to be proficient at 1s, 3s, and slides. Great lateral speed putting up a dominant block up. We like our middles to have the capability to hit from all positions in serve-receive. Libero/DS: great in serve-receive and defense with an ability to read attackers. Want a vocal leader who captains the defense and back-row at all times.
SCHOLARSHIP?  Yes
2019 NEEDS: OH, RS, Libero/DS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: OH: Needs to be a six-rotation player who can pass and hit from multiple positions on the floor including the back row. RS: Strong blocking and hitting presence, can hit from multiple positions on the floor including backrow. Libero/DS: great in serve-receive and defense with an ability to read attackers. Want a vocal leader who captains the defense and back-row at all times.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Quinnipiac is located in Hamden, CT. The University competes in the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference (MAAC). A private, coeducational university, Quinnipiac offers 20 graduate and 58 undergraduate programs in a technology-rich environment. Ranked among best universities offering undergraduate and master’s degree programs in U.S. News & World Report’s “America’s Best Colleges” and The Princeton Review’s “The Best 373 Colleges;” School of Business included in Bloomberg BusinessWeek’s “Top 100 Undergraduate Business Schools;” graduate physician assistant program ranked 5th nationally by U.S. News & World Report; graduate pathologists’ assistant program is the oldest and largest in the country.

School.Name: Regis University (Colorado)
School.Description: Since 1877, Regis University has provided an excellent liberal arts education in the Jesuit, Catholic tradition. Located in Denver, Colorado, where the sun shines over 300 days a year, the up and coming economy provides for tremendous professional opportunities and great recreational activities. The newly established College of Computer Science and College of Business are expanding the already solid academic offerings Regis provides and is thus recognized by US News and World Report as a “Top Tier University” in the Western US. With an enrollment of 2,000 traditional undergraduate students, Regis has a very personal style to its educational experience (you aren’t just a number!) and there is a rich tradition of making life-long friends

Located in Denver, Colorado, where the sun shines over 300 days a year, the up and coming economy provides for tremendous professional opportunities and great recreational activities. The newly established College of Computer Science and College of Business are expanding the already solid academic offerings Regis provides and is thus recognized by US News and World Report as a “Top Tier University” in the Western US. With an enrollment of 2,000 traditional undergraduate students, Regis has a very personal style to its educational experience (you aren’t just a number!) and there is a rich tradition of making life-long friends

School.Name: Salem International University
School.Description: SIU is a small NCAA Div. II school (under 400 students). We are very athletic friendly and a good place to succeed academically with our non-traditional class format. Here you can balance being an athlete and a student, graduate on time and even receive a masters in five years. Our volleyball team was new for 2014, but we are progressing quickly. If you want to grow with a program on the way up and learn a more dynamic way to play volleyball, SIU is for you. Just fill out our VB questionnaire on our website and we will get you the info you need.

School.Name: Sam Houston State University
School.Description: Sam Houston State is located in Huntsville, centrally located in the state of Texas. We are 1hr from downtown Houston, 2.5 hours from Dallas and Austin, and 3 hours from San Antonio. SHSU is the third oldest university in the state of Texas yet we boast over $230M in new and renovated facilities. Sam Houston State is a NCAA Division I athletic program with over 80 undergraduate programs, 50 master’s programs, and 6 doctoral programs. Some of our most sought out programs include Kinesiology, Nursing, Business, and top-5 nationally ranked Criminal Justice. The volleyball program competes in the Southland Conference, and historically finishes in the top three every year. The team is coached by Brenda Gray, who has coached at SHSU for over 33 years, and has earned over 645 wins. Eat ‘em up Kats!!

LOCATION (City, State): Huntsville, TX

2017 NEEDS: FULL
2018 NEEDS: Middle, 6-Rot Outside, RH
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: 3.0 GPA or higher for all. Middles touching over 10 feet and quick in transition and lateral movement and able to hit a slide attack; 5’11” or taller. Outsides and Rightsides need to be at 9’10″ or higher, and OH must be 6 rotation players and have a termination arm swing. Preferred height of 6’0″ or taller, and there must be a focus on ball control.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes (MB, OH, RH)
2019 NEEDS: Setter, Middle, Outside/RH, DS/Libero
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: 3.0 GPA or higher for all. Setters must be capable of running a 5-1 offense, preferably 5’8” or taller (lefties welcome), and a defensive stud. Middles touching over 10 feet and quick in transition and lateral movement and able to hit a slide attack; 5’11” or taller. Outsides and Rightsides need to be at 9’10″ or higher, and OH must be 6 rotation players and have a termination arm swing. Preferred height of 6’0″ or taller, and there must be a focus on ball control. DS/L must be the top passer and defensive player, have a voice on the court, and solid serve.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes (Setter, MB & OH/RH); Walk-On (DS/L)

SHSU is the third oldest university in the state of Texas yet we boast over $230M in new and renovated facilities. Sam Houston State is a NCAA Division I athletic program with over 80 undergraduate programs, 50 master’s programs, and 6 doctoral programs. Some of our most sought out programs include Kinesiology, Nursing, Business, and top-5 nationally ranked Criminal Justice. The volleyball program competes in the Southland Conference, and historically finishes in the top three every year. 2016 NEEDS: Two Outsides or Opposites, and two Middles
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outsides should be solid passers and able to play 6 rotations. Middles should have good lateral quickness and be able to effectively hit true quick attacks and slides. All hitters should be able to touch 9-8. 3.8 GPA and a 1250 SAT or 28 ACT qualifies for $21,000 in academic money. 3.2 GPA and 1050 SAT or 23 ACT qualifies for $12,000 academic money.
SCHOLARSHIP? Partial athletic scholarships available for all four players, and can be combined with academic scholarship money and need-based financial aid. (Based on your FAFSA)
2017 NEEDS: One Middle, possibly a Setter to redshirt
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Middles should have good lateral quickness and be able to effectively hit true quick attacks and slides. All hitters should be able to touch 9-8. Setters should have great LOCATION to the pins and the ability to set their middles from a good range; also need to be quick and athletic, preferably able to put up a significant block. 3.8 GPA and a 1250 SAT or 28 ACT qualifies for $21,000 in academic money. 3.2 GPA and 1050 SAT or 23 ACT qualifies for $12,000 academic money.

SCHOLARSHIP? Partial athletic scholarships available for all four players, and can be combined with academic scholarship money and need-based financial aid. (Based on your FAFSA)
2019 NEEDS: One Outside, one Setter, and one Middle.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outsides should be solid passers and able to play 6 rotations. Middles should have good lateral quickness and be able to effectively hit true quick attacks and slides. All hitters should be able to touch 9-8. Setters should have great LOCATION to the pins and the ability to set their middles from a good range; also need to be quick and athletic, preferably able to put up a significant block. 3.8 GPA and a 1250 SAT or 28 ACT qualifies for $21,000 in academic money. 3.2 GPA and 1050 SAT or 23 ACT qualifies for $12,000 academic money.
SCHOLARSHIP? Partial athletic scholarships available for all three players, and can be combined with academic scholarship money and need-based financial aid. (Based on your FAFSA)

School.Name: Seton Hill University
School.Description: Coeducational Catholic liberal arts university in Pennsylvania’s Laurel Highlands. Founded in 1885.200 acre main hilltop campus, adjacent “downtown” campus in the historic cultural district of Greensburg, Pa. 80 + undergraduate academic programs. Graduate programs in education, business (MBA), orthodontics, art therapy, marriage & family therapy, physician assistant and writing popular fiction. Mobile Learning Program provides students and faculty with iPads & MacBooks. 2,500 students. 95% career/graduate school placement rate; 98% career placement rate for graduates of our master’s programs. Home of the Lake Erie College of Osteopathic Medicine at Seton Hill & the National Catholic Center for Holocaust Education. World-class Performing Arts Center.21 NCAA DII athletic programs. 35 miles from Pittsburgh, Pa. U.S. News & World Report rankings

School.Name: SMU (Southern Methodist University)
School.Description: SMU is a nationally ranked private university with seven degree-granting schools, SMU is a distinguished center for teaching and research located near the heart of Dallas. SMU is celebrating the centennial of its founding in 1911 and its opening in 1915. As SMU enters a second century of achievement, it is recognized as a university of increasing national prominence. SMU prepares students for leadership in their professions and in their communities. The University’s location near the heart of Dallas – a thriving center of commerce and culture – offers students enriching experiences on campus and beyond. Relationships in the Dallas area provide a platform for launching careers throughout the world. SMU’s fall 2014 enrollment of 11,272 includes 6,391 undergraduates and 4,881 graduate students. The student-faculty ratio is 11

School.Name: University of Arkansas
School.Description: Our picturesque campus is located in Fayetteville in the hilly northwest corner of Arkansas and includes two arboreta overlooking the Ozark Mountains. Some of the nation’s best outdoor amenities and most spectacular hiking trails are within a short drive of campus. Fayetteville is routinely considered among the country’s finest college towns and the surrounding Northwest Arkansas region is regularly ranked one of the best places to live in the U.S. As a member of the prestigious SEC, we get to compete week in and week out at the highest level.

School.Name: University of California Merced
School.Description: UC Merced opened Sept. 5, 2005, as the 10th campus in the University of California Opens a new window system and the first American research university of the 21st century. Situated near Yosemite National Park, the campus significantly expands access to the UC system for students throughout the state, with a special mission to increase college-going rates among students in the San Joaquin Valley. It also serves as a major base of advanced research, a model of sustainable design and construction, and a stimulus to economic growth and diversification throughout the region.

School.Description: UCA is a medium-sized (~13,000 undergrad) school located in beautiful, Conway, Arkansas. We are a Division I volleyball program and we compete in the Southland Conference. Over the past five seasons, our program has experienced a tremendous amount of success (5 year record

BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: UCA is a medium-sized (~13,000 undergrad) school located in beautiful, Conway, Arkansas. We are a Division I volleyball program and we compete in the Southland Conference. Over the past five seasons, our program has experienced a tremendous amount of success (5 year record: 124-43 (.743%) Southland record: 71-13 (.845%)) and our staff is driven to continue that tradition of success.

Needs.Requirements: OH – 5’11+, 9’9″+ L2-type, 6-rotations, Low Error, High IQ, Creative, Solid Passing/Def Fundamentals

OH – 6’+, 9’11″+, L1-type, Terminator, Heavy Arm, Athletic, 6-rotations preferred, Strong Blocker, Competitor; MB- 6’2″+, 10’+, M2-type, Physical Blocker, Attacks well in front of the Setter, Quick Lateral Speed

Setter – 5’10+, Athletic, Competitive, Fast Feet, High Hand Contact, Loves to Train; RS – 6’1+, 9’11+, Strong, Heavy Arm, Big Block, Someone we could train to play 6-rotations; OH – 5’11+, 9’9″+ L2-type, 6-rotations, Low Error, High IQ, Creative, Solid Passing/Def Fundamentals
MB – 6’2″+, 10’+, M1-type, Fast, Athletic, Good Attacker off of one foot; OH – 6’+, 9’11″+, L1-type, Terminator, Heavy Arm, Athletic, 6-rotations preferred, Strong Blocker, Competitor

School.Description: The University of Hartford is a private and independent university that competes in the America East Conference. The University of Hartford offers a wide variety of majors most holding the highest level of accreditation (Engineering, Business, Performing Arts, and Health Sciences). Located directly in between Boston & New York City, it is a wonderful place to explore year round.

2017 NEEDS: Pin Attacker or Middle; DS/L
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Attacker/Middle – should be a solid point scorer both attacking and blocking

2018 NEEDS: Middle
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Quick lateral movement and off the ground attacking, fast arm, touching at least 9’9+
SCHOLARSHIP: Yes – full athletic
2019 NEEDS: Middle, Outside & Setter
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Prefer speed over size with this middle position with a quick arm. Offensively, looking for her to be able to attack behind the setter. With the outside looking for this player to be terminal. Size is not a limiting factor but having the range to hit on both pins is a big plus. The setting position, looking for someone who is athletic and has the capability of directing a team (the ultimate gym rat).
SCHOLARSHIP: Yes
2020 NEEDS: 2 Outsides & 2 Middles
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: The outsides for 2020 we would love for both to be 6 rotation players and be able to be effective score all over the court. One middle should be over 6’1 and a competent blocker touching over 9’10. The other middle more of an emphasis on speed with a fast arm.
SCHOLARSHIP: Yes

Prefer speed over size with this middle position with a quick arm. Offensively, looking for her to be able to attack behind the setter. With the outside looking for this player to be terminal. Size is not a limiting factor but having the range to hit on both pins is a big plus. The setting position, looking for someone who is athletic and has the capability of directing a team (the ultimate gym rat).

The outsides for 2020 we would love for both to be 6 rotation players and be able to be effective score all over the court. One middle should be over 6’1 and a competent blocker touching over 9’10. The other middle more of an emphasis on speed with a fast arm.

School.Name: University of Houston
School.Description: UH is located in Houston, Texas, the nation’s fourth-largest city and the energy capital of the world. Founded in 1927, the University of Houston is the leading public research university in the vibrant international city of Houston. UH is home to more than 40,000 students and offers undergraduates 120 majors and minors. UH was ranked #4 in the nation in “12 Top Colleges Where Students Get the Best Bang for Their Buck.”. The University of Houston is the second most ethnically diverse major research university in the United States. UH is the home to one of the most storied athletics programs in the nation. The Cougars have won 62 NCAA individual championships and 17 NCAA team titles, been in 21 bowls, appeared in five NCAA Finals Fours in men’s basketball, and earned a berth to the College World Series. UH offers 17 intercollegiate sports and compete in the American Athletic Conference.
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME: University of Houston
LOCATION (City, State): Houston, TX
DIVISION: I
CONTACT NAME: Jason Allen
CONTACT PHONE#: 713-743-8990
CONTACT E-MAIL: uhvolley@uh.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE: http://www.uhcougars.com/sports/w-volley/hou-w-volley-body.html
2017 NEEDS: Walk-on positions only
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:
SCHOLARSHIP? No
2018 NEEDS: Middle, Outside/Right Side, Libero/Defensive Specialist
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Middle: Dynamic athlete, fast laterally, works hard to always be available to attack, efficient of one and two feet, can create a strong blocking presence, fast arm swing, good and consistent hand contact on ball, work horse, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; 3 Rotation Outside: Dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system and out of system, great hand contact on the ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; 6 Rotation Outside: 6 rotation pass to attack player, has touch with platform, dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system and out of system, good and consistent hand contact on ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’9; Right Side: Dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system, good and consistent hand contact on ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; DS/Libero: Has touch with platform, knows how to use angles, fights to hold posture in passing and defense, can deliver a good out of system set to an attacker, leads with communication on passing – coverage – defense – attacker shots, quick feet to ball, reads attackers
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
2019 NEEDS: Setter, Middle, Outside/Right Side, Defensive Specialist
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Setter: Offensive minded, ability to run a fast up-tempo offense, has quick feet to get to balls, high & neutral contact point, ability to read opponent’s block, vocal leader, work horse on her team, maintains energy level of team, loves to compete, not afraid to push teammates to be better, approach touch 9’8 or higher, etc.; Middle: Dynamic athlete, fast laterally, works hard to always be available to attack, efficient of one and two feet, can create a strong blocking presence, fast arm swing, good and consistent hand contact on ball, work horse, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; 3 Rotation Outside: Dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system and out of system, great hand contact on the ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; 6 Rotation Outside: 6 rotation pass to attack player, has touch with platform, dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system and out of system, good and consistent hand contact on ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’9; Right Side: Dynamic athlete, can create a strong blocking presence, point scorer in system, good and consistent hand contact on ball, willing to find ways to score, low error, can score with physical power, approach touch close to or higher than 9’10; DS/Libero: Has touch with platform, knows how to use angles, fights to hold posture in passing and defense, can deliver a good out of system set to an attacker, leads with communication on passing – coverage – defense – attacker shots, quick feet to ball, reads attackers
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: UH is located in Houston, Texas, the nation’s fourth-largest city and the energy capital of the world.  Founded in 1927, the University of Houston is the leading public research university in the vibrant international city of Houston. UH is home to more than 40,000 students and offers undergraduates 120 majors and minors.  UH was ranked #4 in the nation in “12 Top Colleges Where Students Get the Best Bang for Their Buck.”.  The University of Houston is the second most ethnically diverse major research university in the United States.  UH is the home to one of the most storied athletics programs in the nation. The Cougars have won 62 NCAA individual championships and 17 NCAA team titles, been in 21 bowls, appeared in five NCAA Finals Fours in men’s basketball, and earned a berth to the College World Series.  UH offers 17 intercollegiate sports and compete in the American Athletic Conference.

2016 NEEDS: two outsides, one middle
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outsides must be successful six rotation athletes with competitive energy and fast arm swings. Middles should have quick feet, excellent blocking ability, and be able to seamlessly move from pin to pin. Applicable knowledge of swing blocking a plus.  Successful applicants will touch 9’6 or higher, and have a 3.0 GPA or higher.

2018 NEEDS: MH/MB, DS/L

DS/L – Someone who is good at serve receive, great ball control, great pursuit, calm, reads well, disciplined, vocal, can hit a down ball, tough serve.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
2019 NEEDS: OH, MB
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: 6 Rotation OH – Someone who has good ball control, terminator and high IQ,  good jumper and fast off of the floor, fast efficient arm swing and someone who touches at a high point (10’ or higher preferred); Middle Hitter/Blocker – Laterally quick, good efficient footwork, good jump and quick off of the floor, quick compact arm swing and snap, long arms, big hands.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes
2020 NEEDS: OH, MB, S
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: 6 Rotation OH – Someone who has good ball control, terminator and high IQ,  good jumper and fast off of the floor, fast efficient arm swing and someone who touches at a high point (10’ or higher preferred); Middle Hitter/Blocker – Laterally quick, good efficient footwork, good jump and quick off of the floor, quick compact arm swing and snap, long arms, big hands; Setter – Great hands, good consistent location, high IQ, good foot speed, vocal, good defense, able to quickly comprehend situations and changes, good block, aggressive serve.
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes

6 Rotation OH – Someone who has good ball control, terminator and high IQ, good jumper and fast off of the floor, fast efficient arm swing and someone who touches at a high point (10’ or higher preferred); Middle Hitter/Blocker – Laterally quick, good efficient footwork, good jump and quick off of the floor, quick compact arm swing and snap, long arms, big hands.

6 Rotation OH – Someone who has good ball control, terminator and high IQ, good jumper and fast off of the floor, fast efficient arm swing and someone who touches at a high point (10’ or higher preferred); Middle Hitter/Blocker – Laterally quick, good efficient footwork, good jump and quick off of the floor, quick compact arm swing and snap, long arms, big hands; Setter – Great hands, good consistent location, high IQ, good foot speed, vocal, good defense, able to quickly comprehend situations and changes, good block, aggressive serve.

2018 NEEDS: MB

2019 NEEDS: OH, MB, DS
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Outside Hitters must have the ability to play 6-rotations and score from both the front row and back row.  Middle Hitters should be proficient at swing blocking and have the ability to run an effective slide attack.  We currently have front row players touching 10’ or higher and would love to maintain that moving forward.  Defensive Specialist/Libero must have a great serve, great serve receive passing and able to take a 2nd ball with their hands.  All players must be willing to work hard and earn their playing time as everyone will have the ability to start as a freshman (if earned).
SCHOLARSHIP? Yes for all – DS will be a 2 year

School.Name: University of Tennessee at Chattanooga
School.ContactName: Savanah Stansell – Assistant Coach and Recruiting Coordinator
School.Description: UT-Chattanooga is a medium-sized public university (approximately 10,000 undergrad students enrolled, in addition to around 1,000 graduate students) located less than a mile away from the heart of downtown Chattanooga, Tennessee. Some of our strongest academic majors include Business (undergrad and MBA programs), Engineering, Nursing, Communications, Psychology, Biology, Chemistry, and Human & Health Performance. All of our on-campus housing options are apartment style and our college campus, which is truly a campus and completely separate from downtown, is in walking distance to one of the up-and-coming downtowns in the entire Southeast. Recently voted as one of the top 5 places to live by “Outside Magazine” because of its LOCATION, climate, landscape, and outdoor activities, Chattanooga is located in the Tennessee Valley, with the Tennessee River cutting through the edge of downtown, and surrounded by mountains. UTC offers an amazing opportunity to be a student-athlete at one of the “sleeping giants” in the Southeast, when it comes to a growing university and campus, an ultra-competitive mid-major Division I athletic department, and a vibrant, clean, and safe city!
School.Html:
SCHOOL NAME:  University of Tennessee at Chattanooga
LOCATION (City, State):  Chattanooga, Tennessee
DIVISION: I
CONTACT NAME:  Savanah Stansell – Assistant Coach and Recruiting Coordinator
CONTACT PHONE#:  (423) 425-2227
CONTACT E-MAIL:  Savanah-Parra@utc.edu
VOLLEYBALL WEBSITE:  http://www.gomocs.com/SportSelect.dbml?&DB_OEM_ID=17700&SPID=10586&SPSID=88729
2016 NEEDS: Middle Blocker, Outside Hitter, and Libero
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:  Our middles currently range from 6-0 to 6-2 in height and jump touch from 9-10 to 10-1, and we would like to maintain those measurements as a minimum.  We love for our middles to be able to run an effective slide as well, as we train our middles and right sides as one position.  We prefer 6-rotation outsides as we are currently in a 6-2 offense, but that could change by this year.  Our current outsides range from 5-9 to 6-2 in height and jump touch from 9-8 to 10-1, and we would like to maintain those measurements as a minimum.  In our libero position, we look for high volleyball IQ, superior skill and range in serve receive, and an outstanding communicator that competes with great energy and selflessness.
SCHOLARSHIP? 2 available
2017 NEEDS: Setter, Outside Hitter, Middle Blocker, and Libero.
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:  Our current setters are 5-7 and 5-8, and this past season we were in a 6-2 offense for most of the year, but that is not necessarily the system we will be in moving forward with this class.  Our middles currently range from 6-0 to 6-2 in height and jump touch from 9-10 to 10-1, and we would like to maintain those measurements as a minimum.  We love for our middles to be able to run an effective slide as well, as we train our middles and right sides as one position.  We prefer 6-rotation outsides as we are currently in a 6-2 offense, but that could change by this year.  Our current outsides range from 5-9 to 6-2 in height and jump touch from 9-8 to 10-1, and we would like to maintain those measurements as a minimum.  In our libero position, we look for high volleyball IQ, superior skill and range in serve receive, and an outstanding communicator that competes with great energy and selflessness.
SCHOLARSHIP?  2-3 available

School.Name: Virginia Wesleyan College
School.Description: Chartered in 1961, Virginia Wesleyan is an innovative, four-year liberal arts college founded by the United Methodist Church. We specialize in a number of different academic disciplines and are one of the leading research institutions in the United States. Going to school here feels like being part of one big family.

Weber State is a solid University that offers over 250 degree opportunities for a wide range of interest. We excel in the fields of Nursing, Science, Education, and Liberal Arts.

School.Name: Webster University
School.Description: Webster University is located in the suburbs of St. Louis. We offer excellent academics, a competitive volleyball program and an awesome study abroad program (with campuses all over the world). The University has 3,000 students from 50 states and 148 countries. The volleyball team has won the St. Louis Intercollegiate Athletic Conference tournament advancing to the NCAA tournament the last four consecutive years and eight of the last nine years. Coach Graf has led the Gorloks for fourteen years and has had 62 All conference players including 3 Defensive Player of the Years, 2 Player of the Years and 6 Newcomer of the Years.

School.Name: West Virginia University
School.Description: WVU enrolls almost 30,000 students, has more than 1,573 full-time faculty members, and has 15 colleges offering 103 majors at the baccalaureate level, 105 majors at the master’s level, 61 majors at the doctoral level and 17 graduate certificates. WUV is classified as an R1 Institution, or highest research activity university, by the Carnegie Classification of Institutions of Higher Learning. West Virginia University is home to one of the most storied athletics programs in the nation. The Mountaineers boast 22 national champions in men’s and women’s sports, almost 100 team conference titles and more than 200 first-team All-Americans. The success of WVU’s teams contribute to a sense of pride in the community and across the state. The very mention of the word “Mountaineers” evokes a sense of history, tradition and championships. Nationwide, WVU is synonymous with winning.

The Mountaineers boast 22 national champions in men’s and women’s sports, almost 100 team conference titles and more than 200 first-team All-Americans.  The success of WVU’s teams contribute to a sense of pride in the community and across the state. School.Name: Western Carolina University
School.Description: Western Carolina University is a public institution located in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains. A member of the University of North Carolina system, WCU now provides an education to more than 10,000 students from 48 states and 35 countries. The university’s mission is focused on quality education and preparation for responsible citizenship in a changing world. Since its founding, WCU has grown in size to become a major cultural, scientific, and educational force in the region and the state—and we’re still growing. Our academic programs span more than 120 specialities—including the nation’s highest-ranked entrepreneurship and project management programs, a national award-winning teacher education program, a criminal justice program used as a model for North Carolina’s accreditation program, and the nation’s first accredited four-year emergency medical care program. Our distinguished faculty includes national award-winning authors, nationally and internationally recognized experts, and winners of Emmy, O. Henry, and National Endowment for the Arts awards—to name a few.

BRIEF SCHOOL DESCRIPTION: Western Carolina University is a public institution located in the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains.  A member of the University of North Carolina system, WCU now provides an education to more than 10,000 students from 48 states and 35 countries. The university’s mission is focused on quality education and preparation for responsible citizenship in a changing world. Since its founding, WCU has grown in size to become a major cultural, scientific, and educational force in the region and the state—and we’re still growing. Our academic programs span more than 120 specialities—including the nation’s highest-ranked entrepreneurship and project management programs, a national award-winning teacher education program, a criminal justice program used as a model for North Carolina’s accreditation program, and the nation’s first accredited four-year emergency medical care program. Our distinguished faculty includes national award-winning authors, nationally and internationally recognized experts, and winners of Emmy, O. Henry, and National Endowment for the Arts awards—to name a few.

School.Name: Whitman College
School.Description: Whitman College is more than the sum of its parts. Interdisciplinary research opportunities. Small classes. Global connections forged under the guidance of dedicated faculty members. The support it takes to turn college into limitless opportunity. What Whitman College has, it shares. As a small, residential liberal arts college in Eastern Washington’s Walla Walla, Whitman has what it takes to provide an education that goes beyond the classroom. Whitties are scholars, but also explorers and scientists. They climb mountains, travel to far-off corners and advocate for social justice. They care about community and aim to become citizens of the world. A Whitman education is rooted in the traditional liberal arts values like critical thought and academic rigor; add in prestigious internships, off-campus study and civic engagement opportunities, and it becomes more than the sum of its parts. The Whitman experience transforms, allowing students to turn education into life.

SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: DS/lib – leadership qualities, good platform and enjoys serve receive. Good vision of the opponents and reads the ball well, aggressive and fearless.
SCHOLARSHIP? No DIII Schools grant athletic scholarships/ Merit scholarships are available
2019 NEEDS: Setters/OH/OPP
SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS: Same as 2017
SCHOLARSHIP? No DIII Schools grant athletic scholarships/ Merit scholarships are available
